attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have drug and alcohol addicts on Incapacity Benefit (which pays more than JSA), most have free council housing getting their rents and council tax paid.

We have immigrants housed in luxury homes in London getting their rents and council tax paid.

Yet those made redundant like myself with a mortgage only get help with mortgage interest payments after 16 weeks – this stops us doing temporary work because you have to start a new claim when the work stops and then wait another 16 weeks to get mortgage help.  I also receive no help with Service Charges on my leasehold flat – over £500 a year yet those renting in my block of flats get their full rents paid.

The social security system needs to be reformed so that it encourages work and penalises the work shy.

rejection.details: Please be more specific in your title about the type of reform you are suggesting and resubmit. Your current title is quite wide-ranging.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
